SELECT itemid, name, price, image1 FROM item WHERE cateid=#{cateid}
SELECT * FROM item WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{txt},'%')
SELECT i.itemid, i.cateid, cat.name AS cate_name, i.name, i.price, i.image1, i.image2, i.image3, i.rdate FROM item i INNER JOIN cate cat ON i.cateid = cat.cateid ORDER BY i.itemid
SELECT itemid, name, price, image1 FROM item ORDER BY rdate DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT itemid, name, price, image1 FROM item ORDER BY rdate DESC LIMIT 1, 1;

SELECT itemid, image1 FROM item ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 6;
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET name = #{name}, price = #{price}, image1 = #{image1}, image2 = #{image2}, image3 = #{image3}, rdate=NOW() WHERE itemid = #{itemid};
mapper.select: SELECT i.itemid, i.cateid AS top_cate, cat.name AS cate_name, i.name, i.price, po.color AS po_color, po.size AS po_size, po.stock AS po_stock FROM item i INNER JOIN cate cat ON i.cateid = cat.cateid INNER JOIN product_option po ON i.itemid = po.itemid WHERE i.itemid = #{itemid}
